thread.title: BRIEF-Toachi Mining Says Appoints Alain Bureau As President And CEO

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Toachi Mining Says Appoints Alain Bureau As President And CEO

organizations.name: brief-toachi mining says appoints alain bureau

text:
Jan 31 (Reuters) - Toachi Mining Inc:
* TOACHI MINING SAYS APPOINTS OF ALAIN BUREAU, EFFECTIVE TODAY, AS PRESIDENT AND CEO
* TOACHI MINING - ALAIN BUREAU REPLACING JONATHAN GOODMAN AS CEO
* TOACHI MINING - JONATHAN GOODMAN WILL TRANSITION FROM PRESIDENT AND CEO TO CHAIRMAN OF BOARD
* TOACHI MINING INC - LAURIE CURTIS, CHAIRMAN, CO-FOUNDER, WILL REMAIN ON TOACHIâ€˜S BOARD AS A DIRECTOR Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
